accountGroups.description: List of account groups to create

country.description: Country official English name, 2 letter or 3 letter ISO 3166-1 code.

Address.description: The address details. The total length of address + zip + city cannot exceed 103 characters.

BatchingParams.description: Parameters to group credit transfers into batches

accounts.description: List of cash accounts to create

accountNumber.description: The cash account number, can be an IBAN or a BBAN (unstructured account number).

alias.description: More familiar or preferential name for which the cash account is also known as.

groups.description: Set of ID's of groups the cash account should belong to.

items.description: Set of ID's of groups the cash account should belong to.

hasBankFeedback.description: Identify whether the bank sends feedback for this account or not. If set to false then transactions from this account will be marked as processed as soon as we received an ACK

alias.description: More familiar or preferential name for which the cash account is also known as.

hasBankFeedback.description: Identify whether the bank sends feedback for this account or not.

accountNumber.description: Account number for counterparty. Ignored if an ID is provided.

Counterparty.description: Counterparty account info. Only one of ID or accountNumber is required.

CounterpartyBulkCreateRequest.description: JSON containing a list of counterparties to be created

accountNumber.description: The counterparty account number, can be an IBAN or a BBAN (unstructured account number).

aliasName.description: The alias name for the new account.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the individual.

externalId.description: The external ID for this counterparty. Can be used to match against an external system.

firstName.description: The first name of the individual. This field is mandatory if type is INDIVIDUAL.

lastName.description: The last name of the individual. This field is mandatory if type is INDIVIDUAL.

riskLevelName.description: The name of the associated risk level.

type.description: The type of the new counterparty account.

accountName.description: Organization's name or individual's full name.

accountNumber.description: The counterparty account number, can be an IBAN or a BBAN (unstructured account number).

aliasName.description: The alias name for the new account.

externalId.description: The external ID for this counterparty. Can be used to match against an external system.

type.description: The type of the new counterparty account.

aliasName.description: The new alias name for the account.

firstName.description: The first name of the individual. This field is only considered if type is INDIVIDUAL.

lastName.description: The last name of the individual. This field is only considered if type is INDIVIDUAL.

creditTransfers.description: List of credit transfers create request

authorisationDate.description: Authorisation deadline date in ISO extended format yyyy-MM-dd

executionDate.description: Requested execution date in ISO extended format yyyy-MM-dd

reference.description: Alphanumeric reference that uniquely identifies a credit transfer. If a reference is not provided the system will automatically generate one

CreditTransferCreateRequest.description: Credit transfer create request for V2

draft.description: Transactions created as draft do not have any automatic treatment. They have to be explicitly sent for authorization after creation.

CreditTransferCreateRequestOptions.description: Options to apply to all submitted credit transfers

reference.description: Unique reference for the direct debit batch

summaryByStatus.description: Direct debit requests summary (count and amount) grouped by their status

totalCount.description: Number of direct debit requests contained within this direct debit batch

directDebitBatches.description: List of direct debit batches to create

DirectDebitBulkCreateRequest.description: JSON containing a list of direct debit batches information

DirectDebitBulkCreateResponse.description: Direct debit batch bulk create response containing the IDs of the created resources

DirectDebitCreateRequest.description: List of direct debit batches to create

batchId.description: ID of the created direct debit batch

directDebitIds.description: List of the IDs of the created direct debit requests

items.description: List of the IDs of the created direct debit requests

autoTransfer.description: If set to true, direct debit batch initiation requests will be sent to the bank automatically when authorised. That is the default behavior if no value is provided

batchName.description: Unique name for the direct debit batch. If not provided, one will be generated automatically

DirectDebitCreationMetadata.description: Collection level metadata information applicable to all individual transactions contained within the request

DirectDebitSummaryResponse.description: Direct debit requests summary (count and amount) grouped by their status

amount.description: Amount of the direct debit request

currency.description: Currency of the direct debit request. Only EUR is currently supported

endToEndId.description: Optional, if end to end ID is not provided, a unique one will be generated

mandateDateOfSignature.description: Mandate date of signature in ISO extended format yyyy-MM-dd

requestedCollectionDate.description: Requested collection date in ISO extended format yyyy-MM-dd

DirectDebitTransactionRequest.description: Set of characteristics that apply to the credit side of the direct debit transaction initiation

country.description: Country official English name, 2 letter or 3 letter ISO 3166-1 code.

OptionalAddress.description: The address details. The total length of address + zip + city cannot exceed 103 characters.

accountNumber.description: Account number for ordering party. Ignored if an ID is provided.

OrderingParty.description: Ordering party account info. Only one of ID or accountNumber is required.

detail.description: Explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

status.description: HTTP status code of the problem

title.description: Short summary of the problem type

type.description: URI reference that identifies the problem type

detail.description: Explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

status.description: HTTP status code of the problem

title.description: Short summary of the problem type

type.description: URI reference that identifies the problem type

validationErrors.description: Semantic or constraint validation errors of the provided resources.

RelatedParty.description: counterparty account data of credit transfer

category.description: The category of the risk level

nameKey.description: Name translation key of the Risk level

isIntraday.description: Specifies if the balance is final (false) or intraday (true)

transactionId.description: Lynks transaction ID (available only for transactions originated from Lynks)

aggregatedSum.description: Aggregated sum of the transaction amounts
Aggregated sum of the transaction amounts

errorMessage.description: Error message describing the problem with the provided resource.

inputIndex.description: Corresponding input index to which the error message applies, if applicable.

ValidationError.description: Semantic or constraint validation errors of the provided resources.

accountNumber.description: Account number. Ignored if an ID is provided.

creditor.description: Creditor account info. Only one of ID or accountNumber is required.

accountNumber.description: Account number. Ignored if an ID is provided.

debtor.description: Debtor account info. Only one of ID or accountNumber is required.
